name: Push-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders by pushing the body away from the floor.

name: Deadlift
description: A strength exercise that works the entire posterior chain by lifting a weight off the ground.

name: Squat
description: A compound exercise that targets the lower body and core by lowering the hips and standing back up.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the back and biceps by pulling the body up to a bar.

name: Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps by curling a weight towards the shoulder.

name: Plank
description: A bodyweight exercise that strengthens the core by maintaining a straight posture while balancing on the forearms and toes.

name: Lunge
description: A lower-body exercise that targets the legs and glutes by stepping forward and lowering the body.

name: Shoulder Press
description: A strength exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing a weight overhead.

name: Russian Twist
description: An abdominal exercise that targets the obliques by twisting the torso from side to side.

name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that strengthens the chest, triceps, and shoulders by pressing a weight from a lying position.
